definition: A savory condiment made from a specific fruit, typically used as a base for various culinary preparations, such as pasta dishes or pizza toppings.

examples.german: Ich mache eine Tomatensauce f√ºr die Pasta.
examples.english: I am making a tomato sauce for the pasta.
The tomato sauce tastes very delicious.

examples.german: Die Tomatensauce ist eine wichtige Zutat in vielen Gerichten.
examples.english: Tomato sauce is an important ingredient in many dishes.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern eine Tomatensauce gekocht.
examples.english: I cooked a tomato sauce yesterday.

examples.german: Die Tomatensauce ist reich an Vitamin C.
examples.english: Tomato sauce is rich in vitamin C.
